Description: The Fair King's most treasured possession. Incidentally, it contains the last vestige of Bourdain, who was one of the Seven Against Nidah.
LevelDescriptionText: 5|The Fair King will not easily part from his mirror~10|You may speak to Bourdain on your ship~15|You recruited Bourdain
ChangeDescriptionText: 5|The Fair King will not easily part from his mirror.~10|You may speak to Bourdain on your ship.~15|You have recruited Bourdain.
Name: Wrack: For Want of a Mirror
